item.description:
Wish you were making more progress toward achieving your health goals and New Year’s resolutions?  Want to get rid of what's blocking you?  Looking for support? 

If so, join our discussion! 

Amy LaBossiere, a holistic health coach, will be facilitating a dialogue where we’ll address these questions: 

• What have you done in the last year to Upgrade Your Life? 
• What are the obstacles to an Upgrade?
• What areas of your life do you need to Upgrade:  Diet?  Exercise?  Self-Care?

We’ll talk about our efforts to get healthy and boost our lifestyles toward greater wellness, vibrancy, and authentic body weight.   

We’ll talk about our efforts to boost our energy, achieve greater mental clarity, get better sleep, and achieve authentic body weight, and we'll discuss any other health goals people have.

Amy will present recommendations for how you can create your unique path to wellness.

By the end of the night, you will possess greater self-awareness and feel more confident and inspired about what steps to take next.

Please bring an open mind, questions, success stories, and ideas to share with the group!

***************************************

About Amy LaBossiere:

Amy has been working professionally in communications for more than 20 years, including stints in various small to mid-size advertising agencies and an alternative magazine as editor. She currently works from home as a consultant in marketing and holistic health.

Amy found a passion for health while pursuing her Master’s in Conscious Evolution, and after she earned her masters, she enrolled at the Institute for Integrative Nutrition. She is a certified holistic health coach who helps individuals achieve greater health and happiness.  She is certified by the American Association of Drugless Practitioners as a board-certified Holistic Health Practitioner. 

Amy is also a mixed media artist and co-owner at Still Waters, a seasonal retreat center in Eastern Connecticut where she plans, schedules and facilitates retreats and cooks nourishing, plant-based meals for groups.

*************************************** 

Schedule for the evening:  

7:15 pm: Potluck Dinner begins.

7:45 - 8:30 pm: Discussion

8:30 pm -  9:30 on:  Hanging out and clean up
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the backdoor by the murals. Walk down the long corridor. At the end of the corridor is the art gallery where we meet.
item.name: Discussion about "Upgrading Your Life For Optimal Wellness!" & Potluck Dinner
